title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: members, contributors, leaders pledge make participation community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, visible invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity expression, level experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, caste, color, religion, sexual identity orientation. pledge act interact ways contribute open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, healthy community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders responsible clarifying enforcing standards acceptable behavior take appropriate fair corrective action response behavior deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful. Community leaders right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, communicate reasons moderation decisions appropriate.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported community leaders responsible enforcement codeofconduct@posit.co. complaints reviewed investigated promptly fairly. community leaders obligated respect privacy security reporter incident.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders follow Community Impact Guidelines determining consequences action deem violation Code Conduct:

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Use inappropriate language behavior deemed unprofessional unwelcome community. Consequence: private, written warning community leaders, providing clarity around nature violation explanation behavior inappropriate. public apology may requested.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: violation single incident series actions. Consequence: warning consequences continued behavior. interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, specified period time. includes avoiding interactions community spaces well external channels like social media. Violating terms may lead temporary permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: serious violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior. Consequence: temporary ban sort interaction public communication community specified period time. public private interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, allowed period. Violating terms may lead permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Demonstrating pattern violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior, harassment individual, aggression toward disparagement classes individuals. Consequence: permanent ban sort public interaction within community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 2.1, available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/1/code_of_conduct.html. Community Impact Guidelines inspired [Mozilla’s code conduct enforcement ladder][https://github.com/mozilla/inclusion]. answers common questions code conduct, see FAQ https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq. Translations available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/translations.

title: Design
text: package works internal pin board created pins package, used manage data sets, downloaded, read stored. board created R/aaa-board.R. data set accompanied function used fetch data set. functions thin wrapper around pins::pin_read().

title: Design
text: Run modeldatatoo:::.add_new_data("name_of_data_set"). newly created file data-raw, write code produce desired data set, source file. Push changes except R/name_of_data_set.R Main. Modify R/name_of_data_set.R. Run devtools::document(). (wait pkgdown CI step) Update NEWS.md. Add data set _pkgdown.yml. Push everything Main. done!

what: More Data Sets Useful for Modeling Examples
title: More Data Sets Useful for Modeling Examples
text: modeldatatoo contains data sets used documentation testing tidymodels packages. package also contains suite simulation functions classification regression data. extension modeldata package.

title: More Data Sets Useful for Modeling Examples
text: can install released version modeldatatoo CRAN : can install development version modeldatatoo GitHub :
code: install.packages("modeldatatoo") # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("tidymodels/modeldatatoo")

title: Chimiometrie 2019 Data Set — data_chimiometrie_2019
text: Larsen Clemmensen (2019) state: "data set published challenge Chimiometrie 2019 conference held Montpellier available conference homepage. data consist 6915 training spectra 600 test spectra measured 550 (unknown) wavelengths. target amount soy oil (0-5.5%), ucerne (0-40%) barley (0-52%) mixture." test set included distribution shift due use different instrument competition designed measure models might made resistant difference. However, since test set outcomes, include training set . 6,915 rows 553 columns. columns whose names start wvlgth_ spectral values numbers column names referring order (opposed wavenumber). Fernández Pierna (2020) suggest wavelengths range 1300 2nm 2398 2nm. three outcome columns "soy_oil", "lucerne", "barley".

title: Chimiometrie 2019 Data Set — data_chimiometrie_2019
text: J. Larsen L. Clemmensen (2019) "Deep learning Chemometric non-translational data," arXiv.org, https://arxiv.org/abs/1910.00391. J.. Fernández Pierna, . Laborde, L. Lakhal, M. Lesnoff, M. Martin, Y. Roggo, P. Dardenne (2020) "applicability vibrational spectroscopy multivariate analysis characterization animal feed reference values follow normal distribution: new chemometric challenge posed 'Chimiométrie 2019' congress," Chemometrics Intelligent Laboratory Systems, vol 202, p. 104026. doi:10.1016/j.chemolab.2020.104026

title: elevators data set — data_elevators
text: https://github.com/datanews/elevators

title: elevators data set — data_elevators
text: ... Arguments passed pins::pin_read().

title: elevators data set — data_elevators
text: tibble

title: elevators data set — data_elevators
text: device_number Unique identify number elevator bin Building Identification Number borough Regional subdivisions NYC. One "Manhattan", "Bronx", "Brooklyn", "Queens", "Staten Island" tax_block Id tax block. Smaller borough tax_lot Id tax block. Smaller tax_block house_number House number, poorly parsed. Use caution street_name Street name, poorly parsed. Use caution zip_code Zip code, formatted 5 digits. 0 99999 marked NA device_type Type device. common type "Passenger Elevator" lastper_insp_date Date, refers last periodic inspection Department Buildings. dates longer accurate, collected November 2015 approval_date Date approval elevator manufacturer Name manufacturer, poorly cleaned. assigned NA travel_distance Distance travelled, cleaned. Mixed formats speed_fpm Speed feet/minute capacity_lbs Capacity lbs car_buffer_type Buffer type. buffer device designed stop descending car counterweight beyond normal limit soften force elevator runs pit emergency. Takes values "Oil", "Spring", NA governor_type Governor type, overspeed governor elevator device acts stopping mechanism case elevator runs beyond rated speed machine_type Machine type, labels unknown. safety_type Safety type, labels unknown. mode_operation Operation mode, labels unknown. floor_from Lowest floor, cleaned. Mixed formats floor_to Highest floor, cleaned. Mixed formats latitude Latitude elevator longitude Longitude elevator elevators_per_building number elevators building

text: ... Arguments passed pins::pin_read().

title: Chicago taxi data set — data_taxi
text: tibble

title: Chicago taxi data set — data_taxi
text: source data originally described linked City Chicago data portal. data exported pre-processed subset motivated modeling problem predicting whether rider tip . tip Whether rider left tip. factor levels "yes" "". id unique identifier trip, factor. duration trip duration, seconds. distance trip distance, odometer miles. fare cost trip fare, USD tolls cost tolls trip, USD. extras cost extra charges trip, USD. total_cost total cost trip, USD. sum previous three columns plus tip. payment_type Type payment trip. factor levels "Credit Card", "Dispute", "Mobile", "Charge", "Prcard", "Unknown". company taxi company, factor. Companies occurred times binned "". local Whether trip started community area began. See source data community area values. dow day week trip began, factor. month month trip began, factor. hour hour day trip began, numeric.

text: envir Environment load data sets . Defaults parent.frame(). quiet Logical, function announce data sets loaded. ... Arguments passed pins::pin_read().

title: small_fine_foods data sets — small_fine_foods
text: tibble

title: small_fine_foods data sets — small_fine_foods
text: data Amazon, describe "dataset consists reviews fine foods amazon. data span period 10 years, including ~500,000 reviews October 2012. Reviews include product user information, ratings, plaintext review." subset data contained split training test set. training set sampled 10 products retained individual reviews. Since reviews within products correlated, recommend resampling data using leave-one-product-approach. test set sampled 500 products included training set selected single review random . column product, column text review, factor column class variable. outcome whether reviewer gave product 5-star rating .
